verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's chief economic adviser Larry Kudlow] [V: called] [ARG1: comments by Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau at the G7 summit] [ARG2: a " diplomatic betrayal "] [ARGM-TMP: after Trump abruptly ditched the joint communique on trade] .
